product_name: K2 Chick Style Ski Poles - Women's
long_description: The K2 Chick Style ski poles combine durability and easy style. High-strength 6061 aircraft aluminum shaft offers excellent durability at a great price. New Single Injection grips provide a comfortable, secure hold. Small baskets work well in most snow conditions and excel on hard pack. K2 Chic ski poles include adjustable wrist straps.
short_description: The K2 Chick Style ski poles combine durability and easy style.
